verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus in His heav'nly glory, sits with God upon the throne; noun more to be forsaken, His humiliation gone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Never more shall God, Jehovah, smite the Shepherd with the sword; ne'er again shall cruel sinners set at nought our glorious Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Dwelling in eternal sunshine of the countenance of God, Jesus fills all heaven with incense of HIs reconciling blood.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: On His heart our names are graven, on His shoulders we are borne; of our God beloved in Jesus, we can love Him in return.
